segments.text: I gaze through the window above the sink, and the view is quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is a picture of calm and tidiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a clear path and neatly kept bushes, all bathed in soft daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It presents such a serene and orderly scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then my eyes return to the interior, and the contrast is just incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, chaos is slowly but surely unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, creating a spreading puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, two children are engaged in a risky cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, oblivious, keeps polishing her plate as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how different the inside is from the outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden seems to mock the domestic disarray.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can a place feel so normal and so completely out of control at the same time?
segments.speaker: PAR
